MASEventService.Name: GroupSubscriptionsEvents
MASEventService.Description: The GroupSubscription service provides methods for clients to display, add, update and delete group subscriptions for corporate accounts

EventMethod.Name: StartGroupSubscriptions
EventMethod.Description: Method to initiate the adding of a group subscription

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: AccountIdentifier
Parameter.Description: This is an instance of the AccountIdentifier class. This class allows clients to specify either the integer account identifier from the database or the username/namespace of the account. The service can then resolve this information to an account identifier that it can use.

Parameter.Name: AccountType
Parameter.Description: This specifies the type of account for which the eligible product offerings are retrieved.

Parameter.Name: CorporateAccountIdentifier
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter that identifies the parent corporate account

Parameter.Name: StartWithStepGr
Parameter.Description: This is a parameter identifies specific, not first step to start with

EventMethod.Name: CancelManageGroupSubscriptions
EventMethod.Description: Method to abort management of a group subscription

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Name: GetGroupSubscriptionList
EventMethod.Description: Method to obtain a list of members in a subscription group

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: GroupSubscriptionList
Parameter.Description: The list of members in a subscription group

EventMethod.Name: Add
EventMethod.Description: Method to add a new group subscription

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Name: Edit
EventMethod.Description: Method to edit a group subscription

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: GroupSubscriptionId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter that identifies the subscription group to be edited

EventMethod.Description: Method to set the subscription date for a group

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: GroupSubscriptionInstance
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter specifying the group subscription instance to be modified

EventMethod.Name: CancelSetGroupSubscriptionDate
EventMethod.Description: Method to cancel the setting of a group subscription date

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Name: GetGroupPOList
EventMethod.Description: Method to get the product offering list for a specified account

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: ProductOfferingList
Parameter.Description: The list of products available to the customer for subscription

Parameter.Name: EffectiveStartDate
Parameter.Description: The reference parameter identifying the effectiev start date of the specified account

EventMethod.Name: OKSelectProductOffering
EventMethod.Description: Method to verify the selection of a product offering

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: ProductOfferingId
Parameter.Description: A reference parameter identifying the product seelcted

EventMethod.Name: CancelSelectProductOffering
EventMethod.Description: Method to cancel the selection of a product offering

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Description: Method fo navigate back to ManageGroupSubscriptions

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Description: Method to navigate back to the dashboard

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: GroupSubscriptionId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter that identifies the subscription group

Parameter.Description: Each GroupSubMember in this collection represents an account that is going to be added as a member of the group subscription specified by groupSubscriptionId.
